name: You Only Got One Shot
description:
You Only Got One Shot is a multiplayer arena-style game where you and your opponent only have... one shot. The game was made for Ludum Dare 28 where the theme was "You Only Get One".

Originally released in December 2013, the game was updated in May 2016 to revamp the interface and aesthetics, fix bugs and add two new maps.

The game requires at least Java 1.7 installed.

To set up the server:

  • Port forward ports 9001 (TCP) and 9002 (UDP)
  • Run the server

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D - Movement
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Esc - Quit/Main Menu
